title: Interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS caught on camera in new images from Hubble Space Telescope and JUICE Jupiter probe
description: JUICE and the Hubble Space Telescope turned their gazes towards the interstellar visitor in November.
content: JUICE and the Hubble Space Telescope turned their gazes towards the interstellar visitor in November.
